apis.description: Returns a map of dates to grader/assignment groups

operations.summary: Days in gradebook history for this course
operations.notes: Returns a map of dates to grader/assignment groups

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The id of the contextual course for this API call

apis.description:
Returns the graders who worked on this day, along with the assignments they worked on.
More details can be obtained by selecting a grader and assignment and calling the
'submissions' api endpoint for a given date.

operations.summary: Details for a given date in gradebook history for this course
operations.notes:
Returns the graders who worked on this day, along with the assignments they worked on.
More details can be obtained by selecting a grader and assignment and calling the
'submissions' api endpoint for a given date.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The id of the contextual course for this API call

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which you would like to see detailed information

apis.description: Gives a nested list of submission versions

operations.notes: Gives a nested list of submission versions

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The id of the contextual course for this API call

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date for which you would like to see submissions

parameters.name: grader_id
parameters.description: The ID of the grader for which you want to see submissions

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description: The ID of the assignment for which you want to see submissions

apis.description:
Gives a paginated, uncollated list of submission versions for all matching
submissions in the context. This SubmissionVersion objects will not include
the +new_grade+ or +previous_grade+ keys, only the +grade+; same for
+graded_at+ and +grader+.

operations.notes:
Gives a paginated, uncollated list of submission versions for all matching
submissions in the context. This SubmissionVersion objects will not include
the +new_grade+ or +previous_grade+ keys, only the +grade+; same for
+graded_at+ and +grader+.

parameters.name: course_id
parameters.description: The id of the contextual course for this API call

parameters.name: assignment_id
parameters.description:
The ID of the assignment for which you want to see submissions. If
absent, versions of submissions from any assignment in the course are
included.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description:
The ID of the user for which you want to see submissions. If absent,
versions of submissions from any user in the course are included.

parameters.name: ascending
parameters.description:
Returns submission versions in ascending date order (oldest first). If
absent, returns submission versions in descending date order (newest
first).

id.description: the user_id of the user who graded the contained submissions

name.description: the name of the user who graded the contained submissions

assignments.description: the assignment groups for all submissions in this response that were graded by this user.  The details are not nested inside here, but the fact that an assignment is present here means that the grader did grade submissions for this assignment on the contextual date. You can use the id of a grader and of an assignment to make another API call to find all submissions for a grader/assignment combination on a given date.

date.description: the date represented by this entry

graders.description: an array of the graders who were responsible for the submissions in this response. the submissions are grouped according to the person who graded them and the assignment they were submitted for.

SubmissionVersion.description: A SubmissionVersion object contains all the fields that a Submission object does, plus additional fields prefixed with current_* new_* and previous_* described below.

assignment_id.description: the id of the assignment this submissions is for

assignment_name.description: the name of the assignment this submission is for

body.description: the body text of the submission

current_grade.description: the most up to date grade for the current version of this submission

current_graded_at.description: the latest time stamp for the grading of this submission

current_grader.description: the name of the most recent grader for this submission

grade_matches_current_submission.description: boolean indicating whether the grade is equal to the current submission grade

graded_at.description: time stamp for the grading of this version of the submission

grader.description: the name of the user who graded this version of the submission

grader_id.description: the user id of the user who graded this version of the submission

id.description: the id of the submission of which this is a version

new_grade.description: the updated grade provided in this version of the submission

new_graded_at.description: the timestamp for the grading of this version of the submission (alias for graded_at)

previous_grade.description: the grade for the submission version immediately preceding this one

previous_graded_at.description: the timestamp for the grading of the submission version immediately preceding this one

previous_grader.description: the name of the grader who graded the version of this submission immediately preceding this one

score.description: the score for this version of the submission

user_name.description: the name of the student who created this submission

url.description: the url of the submission, if there is one

user_id.description: the user ID of the student who created this submission

workflow_state.description: the state of the submission at this version

versions.description: an array of all the versions of this submission
